query:
UPDATE api_keys ak1
            SET
                name = COALESCE($3, ak2.name),
                description = COALESCE($4, ak2.description),
                updated_at = NOW()
            FROM api_keys ak2
            WHERE ak1.id = $1
                AND ak1.user_id = $2
                AND ak1.id = ak2.id
                AND ak1.user_id = ak2.user_id
